snippet: A big tax increase for Kansas appears inevitable as the state wrestles with budget problems that have left even Republicans ready to roll back income tax cuts that are Gov. Sam Brownback's biggest political legacy....

headline.main: Trade on the Streets, and Off the Books, Keeps Zimbabwe Afloat
headline.print_headline: Trade on Streets, and Off Books, Keeps Zimbabwe Afloat

lead_paragraph: A big tax increase for Kansas appears inevitable as the state wrestles with budget problems that have left even Republicans ready to roll back income tax cuts that are Gov. Sam Brownback's biggest political legacy.
